excerpt: "Clinic™ Hinge Health has announced its intention to combine with wrnch, the self-described ‘world’s most sophisticated computer vision technology’ for use in tracing human motion. Wrnch combines full-body movement motion sensors and innovative computer vision technology to create a comprehensive digital exercise therapy."
